category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEExpandFirstLevelOnLoad
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether the root node of a structure (product, process or plant) is expanded to the first level when it is opened in Manufacturing Process Planner. Valid Values: true - The root node is expanded when opened in Manufacturing Process Planner. false - The root node is not expanded when opened in Manufacturing Process Planner.
